scripts.test: mocha 'test/**.test.js' -- --reporter mochawesome  --no-timeout --reporter-options reportDir=public/report   --reporter-options reportFilename=SeliniumTestReport && node customReportGenerator.js SeliniumTestReport.json
scripts.unit: mocha 'test/unit.js' -- --reporter mochawesome --timeout 10000 --reporter-options reportDir=public/report --reporter-options reportFilename=UnitTestReport && node customReportGenerator.js UnitTestReport.json
